# [Interview #74: AOL Chat, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=74#9)

#### Question

How do you come up with all the details in your stories,
*Tel'aran'rhiod*
, the details of the kingdoms, and the personal histories and all that?

#### Robert Jordan

A lot of hard work.
